chunk:
Klur Unseasonal Kind LIPID REPLENISHMENT OIL

Brand: Klur

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Plant Based (Squalane), Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil (*Jojoba), Rubus Idaeus Seed Oil (Raspberry Seed Oil), Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil (Camellia), Rosa Canina Fruit Oil (*Rosehip Seed), Hippophae Rhamnoides Oil (*Sea buckthorn), Oenother

buckthorn), Oenothera Biennis Oil (*Evening Primrose), Vitis Vinifera Seed Oil (Grapeseed ), Daucus Carota Sativa Seed Oil (Carrot), Fragaria Ananassa Seed Oil (Strawberry), Aqua (Deionized Water), Vaccinium Macrocarpon Seed Oil (Cranberry), Limnanthes Alba Seed Oil (Meadowfoam), Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil (Prickly Pear), Persea Gratissima Oil (

sea Gratissima Oil (Avocado), Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E), Ubiquinone (Coq10), Pelargonium Graveolens Flower Oil (Geranium Essential Oil), Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Tetrahexyldecyl Ascorbate THD (Vitamin C)

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer
